name: Project Garden
description:
This is a procedural garden made for procjam.

The controls are:

"q": to pause the screen;

"e": to take a screenshot;

"f": hold "f" and walk forward to climb something;

Go into the portals to generate another garden.

I hope you enjoy this little game that I made for the jam. I am planning to continue this project and make it into a little game. If you have any suggestions or you want to give me feedback then you can contact me on twitter or via e-mail.

e-mail: rikhendriks@rocketmail.com
